resources.string: Random Restaurant Generator is an open source Android application that picks a restaurant for you based on your location. The source code can be found below.
(Optional) Enter any filter, e.g. vegetarian, bbq, sushi
You don\'t have restaurants added to your Saved List.
Location is off. Please enable Location in your settings.
"Location has not been found yet. Please try again. Acquiring GPS signal may take up to a minute on some devices."
Please enter a valid address, city, zip code, or use GPS by clicking the icon.
No restaurants found at this location, please enter a different location.
Connection timed out, check your internet connection and try again.
No network connection, please turn on your network.
